quoteText: We've previously disabled your account for breaches of our Terms or Policies.</li
title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

tosdr.case: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "but you cannot use Facebook if: You are under 13 years old. You are a convicted sex offender. We've previously disabled your account for violations of our Terms or Policies."
